channel.description:
[CENTER][SIZE=5]BRAND NEW SERVER AS OF 4/14/2013 [/SIZE]
[IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/77384122/tewtrgvysb.png[/img]
[SIZE=2][URL=http://"http://www.toxic-pkz.com"]Homepage[/URL]
Webclient link= [URL=http://"http://toxic-pkz.com/index.php?page=page3381"]Here[/URL]
DL Client link= [URL=http://"https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/77384122/toxic.jar"]Here[/URL][/SIZE]
[SIZE=4]-FEATURES LIST- - Brand new player base just starting out - Countless hours of gameplay - PK Shops - Great and helpful staff (taking mod apps atm on the forums) - VPS hosted 24/7 DDos free - 10+ Minigames - Donator privileges - Nex and many other bosses (11+) - Amazing combat - Full Screen (Toggled in in-game menu) - Hyperion game engine, and event and task system - 99 percent of all bugs fixed - 24 Skills all working to the fullest extent - Flawless switching - Great economy for a fresh start - All new item models with ints - Fast Cache, 60mb - Dicing - Many many more to many to list =)[/SIZE]
Pictures MORE COMING SOON DIDN'T HAVE MUCH TIME TONIGHT JUST WANTED TO RELEASE AS SOON AS I COULD =)
[IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/77384122/FS.png[/img]
